rule: The output text should avoid combining artistic insight with precise imagery.
input: An avocado-green desk overlooks vast city landscapes, suggesting intrigue without vivid detail.
output: A sleek, avocado-green desktop desk sits angled towards a panoramic vista of sprawling cityscapes bathed in the golden light of late afternoon. Buildings rise into the distance, their silhouettes softened by the setting sun, creating an air of mystery and urban allure. The focus remains on the desk's polished surface, reflecting the cityscape in subtle glimpses, hinting at stories unfolding within the unseen world beyond. Capture a mood of quiet contemplation and enigmatic potential.
complianceText:
The chatbot output is a detailed description of an AI-generated photo prompt, adhering to the constraint of a single paragraph and appears to be within 80 words. The description begins with a focus on the subject (a sleek, avocado-green desktop desk) and its characteristics (angled towards a panoramic vista). It then proceeds to detail the timing and lighting (golden light of late afternoon, setting sun) and describes the background (sprawling cityscapes, buildings rising into the distance). The description concludes by conveying the feeling the image should evoke (quiet contemplation and enigmatic potential). The structure and content of the output comply with the requirements outlined in the description.

OK
